titles.title: God Has A Garden And He Calls It Praise

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God has a garden and He calls it praise.
He bids us to enter and walk through the maze.
Well, it's like an ocean so vast and so free,
And God said He made it for you and for me.
Chorus:
So I exalt Him with all of my being.
I will extol Him with all that I am.
And if I should falter, all nature will praise Him.
And I will now glory His precious name.
And I will now glory His precious name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And in that garden there's freedom from sin.
There's no condemnation to those who walk in.
Because of the Keeper, there's love all around.
There's healing and blessing on this holy ground.
